Contradict fact: The claim falsely attributes remarks critical of the Black Lives Matter movement and public health measures to Bubba Watson, which he has denied.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by falsely attributing the post to Bubba Watson and presenting it as his own words.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support its attribution to Bubba Watson.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the post accurately represents Bubba Watson's views on the Black Lives Matter movement and COVID-19 measures, which is not supported by evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the post was created and circulated without any involvement from Bubba Watson.
